text: niccayamaka avvurvacikal iman kontu allahvukku anci natantiruntal, nam avarkalukku vanattiliruntum pumiyiliruntum - parakattukalai - pakkiyankalait tirantu vittiruppom; anal avarkal (napimarkalai nampatu) poyppittanar, akave avarkal ceytu kontirunta (pavat)tin karanamaka nam avarkalaip pitittom
